response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique item is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, it's worth noting that the product has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional attention to detail. I understand its significance to you, as it's valued at $12,000 to you personally. Considering this, I propose an offer of $11,500 for the product. I believe this price reflects its true worth while also allowing us to reach a fair agreement. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 11500}
